attributes.action: Provide financial aid for students on zero hours contracts.
attributes.additional_details: There will be other people in the country that have more important financial responsibilities, such as children and mortgage payments, and students will struggle to find employment that fits around their studies. I feel the students that work alongside studies should be able to receive support to help them through this time.
attributes.background: Some students including myself work alongside their studies on zero hours contracts. Because of the Coronavirus pandemic, we have had our hours reduced or stopped and given the current situation, cannot support ourselves financially, and afford to buy food and pay for accomodation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301328

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
